bind_failure: Failed to verify your account. Try again later.

email_confirmation.email_confirmation_text: We've sent an email to your mailbox, containing a six-digit code for email confirmation. Please type it in the blank.

invalid_email: The input value is not a valid email address.
invalid_password: The password should be between 6 and 24 characters in length.
invalid_username: The username can only contain numbers, underscores and English / Chinese / Japanese / Korean characters, and must be between 4 and 12 characters in length.

login.insufficient_access: Your account is not activated. Please first activate your account before logging in.
login.invalid_request: The request is invalid. Check your credentials and try again.
login.invalid_token: We can't find an account associated with this email address.
login.invalid_token_link: We can't find an account associated with this {{provider}} account.
login.login_text: Log in to participate in player communications and to play charts on PhiZone!

password_reset.password_reset_text: Please enter the code we've just sent you along with your new password.

passwords_differ: The two passwords differ from each other!
redirection_description: Please wait while you're being redirected.

registration.legal_agreement: I have read and agree to the {{terms_of_service}} and {{privacy_policy}}.
registration.registration_text: Register an account to participate in the PhiZone community!
